NK100(the)020:1: // mar khu chen po'i bya thabs bzhugs /
NK100(the)020:2: bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK100(the)020:3: mar khu chen po'i bya thabs 'di la lnga /
NK100(the)020:4: mar khu'i rgyu bstan pa dang gcig /dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa dang gnyis /
NK100(the)020:6: mar khu sgyel ba dang bzhi /
NK100(the)020:7: dngos grub blangs ba dang lnga'o //
NK100(the)020:8: dang po ni bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa'am /
NK100(the)020:9: dge slong tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'am /
NK100(the)020:10: sngags pa dam tshig gtsang zhing bskyed rdzogs bsgom pa'am /
NK100(the)020:11: rnal 'byor pa bsgrub pa tshul bzhin du mdzad pa
NK100(the)020:12: rnams kyi bdud rtsis dang ma 'dres pa bsgrubs la
NK100(the)020:13: / che chung 'thob long tsam du bstubs nas /
NK100(the)020:14: ri khrod yin na brag kha'i lung yin na char ba'i khar skams la /
NK100(the)020:15: g.yar yin na ham pa ma zhugs par bya /
NK100(the)020:16: rgun yin na 'khyag zhur ma song bar bya /
NK100(the)020:17: legs par bskams par dang chom dos brdungs la chang
NK100(the)020:18: nying kha'u kha spru gtab nas slan 'dabs kyis gtang
NK100(the)020:19: la / lag pa dkrus nas phur phur bya /
NK100(the)020:20: mang nyung bre drug tsam byas la /
NK100(the)020:21: phags bu'am ras skye'u lags pa'i snod gtsang ma'i nang du blugs la /
NK100(the)020:22: zhag gcig brdo bas mnan la longs su bzhug /nangs
NK100(the)020:23: par snum phor gyis langs pa dang bre la gzhal
NK100(the)020:24: mo / gnyis pa dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa ni /
NK100(the)020:25: sa stegs mda' gang tsam gcig brtsigs la /
NK100(the)020:27: dbus su thig gling bzhi ri bo mchog rab rin po che'i kha dog bzhi pa bri /
NK100(the)020:29: dbyibs zlum po kha dog ser po bri /
NK100(the)020:30: lhor 'dzam bu gling sog ka kha dog mthing kha bri /
NK100(the)020:31: nub ba lang spyod dbyibs zla kham kha dog dmar po bri /
NK100(the)020:32: byang sgra mi snyan dbyibs gru bzhi kha dog ser po bri /
NK100(the)020:33: mtshams rnams su gling phran gling dang kha dog mthun pa bri /
NK100(the)020:34: de rnams kyi mtha' ma lcags ri nag po zlum po bri /
NK100(the)020:35: mtha' mar mchod pa rnam pa lnga bsham /
NK100(the)020:36: cha gsum spyi dang mthun par gtang /
NK100(the)020:37: khyad par gyi mchod pa sngags gsar rnying gang yin kyang rung ste /
NK100(the)020:39: rnal 'byor pa lha'i dkyil 'khor du gnas par byas la /
NK100(the)020:40: cho ga rgyas bsdus gang yang rung ba bsrang /
NK100(the)020:42: gsum pa thabs bya ba ni /
NK100(the)020:45: dang po ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su brus la /
NK100(the)020:46: khog ma bre do tsam 'gro ba kha bag na chung tsam byas la /
NK100(the)020:47: sa'i khung bu de la bag tsam gcig ma gtogs pa sa'i nang du bcang /
NK100(the)020:48: de'i bdud rtsi bre drug rtsam shong pa de'i snod bsham /
NK100(the)020:49: 'og gi khog ma dang mthun pa zhabs la lcags tshags bzhin du bug pa mang po bya /
NK100(the)020:50: khog ma de'i bsham la ras ser po kha gang dgab /
NK100(the)020:51: bar 'tshams rnams 'dam pa gcin pos sbyar /
NK100(the)020:52: de'i spru ba gong ma de'i nang du bdud rtsi rnams blugs /
NK100(the)020:53: de'i kha dang 'tsham pa'i rje'i kha gcod byas la /
NK100(the)020:55: kha gcod kyi steng du 'dam pa'i sgyed po gsum
NK100(the)020:56: byas la de dang mthun pa'i phyu ba btsugs la
NK100(the)020:57: kha gcod / nang du cang mi dgos /
NK100(the)020:58: de ni bdud rtsi'i gter sba ba'o //
NK100(the)020:59: bzhi pa mar khu sgyil ba ni //
NK100(the)020:60: thabs de spang bzang pos skangs la rtsal dam nyams dang sdom nyams mi gtang /
NK100(the)020:61: rnal 'byor pa dam tshig dang ldan pa rnams kyis mtha' ma skol la nyal lo //
NK100(the)020:62: nang par nam langs pa dang /
NK100(the)020:63: spang thal rnams legs par bsal la /
NK100(the)020:64: 'dag pa rnams skog nas khog ma bar pa kha
NK100(the)020:65: phye la khog ma bsham na de'i nang na rab
NK100(the)020:67: tha ma phul do 'byung ba yin pas /
NK100(the)020:68: de rnams rgyu dag ma dag dang /
NK100(the)020:69: dam tshig rtsang mi gtsang mi gtsang /
NK100(the)020:70: bskal pa dang ldan mi ldan rim pa bzhi 'byung ngo //
NK100(the)020:71: tha ma dngos grub blang pa ni /
NK100(the)020:72: mtha' ma na yod pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis zan gyi skyung chung re bza' /
NK100(the)020:73: des mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
NK100(the)020:74: gzhan yang thun mong gi dngos grub ni /
NK100(the)020:75: rlung nad gags pa rnams kyang 'dis sel lo //
NK100(the)020:76: gdon bgegs kyi bar chad kyang sel /
NK100(the)020:77: 'phral gyi skrangs 'bur dang shu ba lags pa yang 'dis sel /
NK100(the)020:78: rlung log ma rungs pa yang 'dis sel /
NK100(the)020:79: 'di ni gags sel thams cad kyi mchog yin no //
NK100(the)020:80: bsgrub pa'i gnas mchog dpal gyi chu bo rir /
NK100(the)020:81: bla ma sdang dag sde chen nyid la zhus /
